attributes.additional_details:
You can't think it will happen straight away do you .
The Bank of England are ready to inject £250 billion pounds into the financial system and the bank has said they are well prepared to keep the UK afloat . But with also not paying the £10 Billion a Year . Britain can pump that into vital services or build new facilities and buildings for the Nearer Future like i.e Hospitals , Gps , Police , Fire Stations, Schools and so on . Just give Britain a chance .. Believe in Us .
attributes.background:
The Leave Voters obtained a vast support but most voters wont change their mind .Are  the remain voters going to pay for another Eu Referendum.
Why should there be a New Referendum . What because the Pound Fell to a huge scale which was expected but still Countries have bought back into the pound .
